articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Paektusan Institute of Architecture
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Paektusan Institute of Architecture
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Paektusan Institute of Architecture, an icon and standard of designing.
					 Providing field guidance to the institute in July last year, he gave an instruction to turn it into an icon and standard of designing. He guided the layout for internal remodeling several times and settled all matters arising in the project to modernize it.
					
					 Upon being told that the institute was successfully remodeled, he sent it modern designing means recently.
					
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the institute.
					
					 Looking at the historical data and relics showing the history of the leadership provided by leader Kim Jong Il for the development of Juche-oriented architecture, he looked back with deep emotion on the proud path covered by the institute. 
					
					 Going round various places of the institute such as the exhibition of architectural sci-tech achievements, the room for the study of architectural designs, the designing documents room, the information data study room and the inner court, he learnt in detail about the modernization and the work being done at the institute.
					
					 Noting that the designers, architects and researchers of the institute have successfully fulfilled the designing tasks assigned to them by the Party each time a major construction project was to be undertaken in the past, and produced a lot of architectural masterpieces worth national treasures at the highest level, he stressed that it is an able and trustworthy group of designers and an icon and standard of the nation's architectural designing.
					
					 Learning in detail about the technical features and functions of the equipment newly installed at the institute, he said that it could outpace the world even in creating modern architecture only when it widely introduces advanced scientific and technological achievements in the architectural field to suit the actual conditions of the country.
					
					 The institute has a very important duty to perform, he said, setting forth the tasks which would serve as guidelines for its work.
					
					 Saying that the Party shows very deep trust and great expectation for the institute, he expressed expectation and conviction that the officials, designers, architects and researchers of the institute would creditably fulfill their heavy, yet honorable mission and duty in the future, too. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the State Affairs Commission.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Thursday.
					 The message expressed gratitude to Kim Jong Un and the DPRK government and people for extending kind congratulations on the 54th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					
					 It highly appreciated the principled stand of Kim Jong Un and the DPRK leadership that extend solidarity to the Syrian people's struggle for opposing terrorism and defending the sovereignty, security and stability of the country.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Center for Energy and Security Studies of Russia headed by Director Anton Khlopkov arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Traitors Are Bound to Meet Disgraceful Death: Consultative Council for National Reconciliation
articles.content:
Traitors Are Bound to Meet Disgraceful Death: Consultative Council for National Reconciliation
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation issued a statement Saturday in connection with the final judgment passed on traitor Park Geun Hye, 18th-term "president" of south Korea, on Friday.
					 The "constitutional court" of south Korea made a final decision on dismissing Park as "president" after more than 90 days of bitter controversy and twists and turns over the motion calling for her impeachment. 
					
					 This is a stern warning of history which proved that such matchless and heinous traitor will only meet ruin and death, the statement said.
					
					 The statement clarified the following stand on the situation prevailing in south Korea:
					
					 1. It is the unanimous assessment of the nation that the miserable end of Park Geun Hye is a historic victory of justice brought about by the tremendous might of the people.
					
					 This time Park was judged and punished by people, not by any specified force or political dissidents.
					
					 The south Korean political history records lots of mass resistance, big or small, but never has there been such a case in which the people defeated injustice with candlelight of justice and won all-people victory by bringing down the pro-American conservative regime which boasted of omnipotent power.
					
					 2. It is our invariable stand that those who betray the nation and get hell-bent on following outsiders and confrontation with the fellow countrymen can not escape a miserable end like Park.
					
					 For the divided Korean nation, the best justice represents reunification and absolute truth lies in independence, reconciliation and unity.
					
					 Even a drop of blood dedicated to the nation out of patriotism is highly valued and remembered long but acts of treachery with one's back turned on the nation and fellow countrymen are bound to face curse and denunciation by the nation for all ages.
					
					 3. The U.S. and other riff-raffs who shielded human scum Park forsaken by the public will face the same fate as Park's sooner or later. This is a stern warning of the Koreans.
					
					 What excuses and compensation can the traitors make for the shameful and inglorious nature and blunder which caused such great chaos and utter confusion in south Korea no matter how shameful and regretful they may feel.
					
					 Those countries which used to utter honeyed words as "cooperation" and "partnership" just remained a passive on-looker to what was happening in south Korea.
					
					 This is the wretched end of the stooge whose existence is so worthless.
					
					 The south Korean society now stands at crucial crossroads of great changes.
					
					 The south Koreans won a victory in their anti-Park resistance but it is just a beginning in the actions for genuine justice and social progress.
					
					 Nothing will change fundamentally although scarecrow-like Park is brought down, and the new independent politics, new democratic society and new dignified life so much desired by the south Koreans do not come of themselves.
					
					 The south Korean people should totally throw overboard the reactionaries of history with the zeal and courage with which they brought down the citadel of pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese conservative forces with the might of justice and unity and work hard to carve out a bright future of new world and reunification and prosperity where their dreams and ideal come true. 
					
					 Treachery will end in inglorious death and final victory is always in store for the righteous and brave people.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Namhung Youth Chemical Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Namhung Youth Chemical Complex
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex.
					 Going round various production processes of the complex, he encouraged the workers in the efforts to boost the fertilizer production.
					
					 At a consultative meeting held on the spot he organized the work to supply larger quantity of fertilizer to the socialist rural areas and urged the related units to satisfactorily provide raw materials to the complex.
					
					 Earlier, the premier went round the Chollima Steel Complex, where he underscored the need to increase the iron and steel production by cutting down iron production cost through the introduction of advantaged technology and putting the operation of Juche-based production processes on a normal footing in the field of metal industry.

articles.title: More Meetings Held in Provinces of DPRK
articles.content:
More Meetings Held in Provinces of DPRK
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Mass Meetings took place in North Hwanghae and North and South Hamgyong provinces of the DPRK on March 10 and 11 to respond to the appeal sent by the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province to all working people across the country.
					 Present there were officials of party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities and workers and youth and students in the provinces.
					
					 The appeal was read out at the meetings before speeches by representatives of officials, workers, agricultural workers and intellectuals.
					
					 The speakers stressed the need for all officials to proceed to the construction and production sites and bring about uninterrupted fresh miracles and innovations through exemplary practices by learning the spirit and work-style displayed of the Kangwon provincial officials.
					
					 They called upon all officials, party members and other people to create legendary stories about heroes startling the world one after another so as to proudly enter the venue of the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners, watershed of building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The meetings were followed by public processions.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued new stamps (three individuals) introducing three old books on Koryo medicine.
					 Seen in the stamps are old books on Koryo medicine "Hyangyakjipsongbang", "Uibangryuchwi" and "Tonguibogam" and portraits of their writers.
					
					 "Hyangyakjipsongbang" introduces medical achievements and folk clinical experience gained till the early 15th century and "Uibangryuchwi" deals with symptoms of common diseases and their treatments, divided into 95 chapters.
					
					 "Tonguibogam" (25 volumes) expounds anatomico-physiology of human body, checkup and prevention of different diseases and their curative methods in a systematic way. It made a great contribution to the development of Koryo medicine and world medicine for its scientific accuracy and logicality.
					
					 The stamp bureau also published four individual stamps carrying pictures of the Korean tiger.

articles.title: Silk Goods Popular among Citizens
articles.content:
Silk Goods Popular among Citizens
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Korean Silk with a long history is well known over the world for its lightness, softness and beautiful patterns.
					 In recent years, silk factories and the Pyongyang Silk J.V. Company in the DPRK have produced a large quantity of silk goods to make contribution to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The new silk goods are on sale at the Pyongyang Department Store No. 1, Silk Shop and other shops, enjoying great popularity.
					
					 Among them are Korean chima (skirt) and jogori (coat), Korean jacket and trousers, child's striped jacket, bedding and scarf made of over ten kinds of silk fabrics like polychromatic silk, colored silk and yaksan silk (a kind of figured satin).
					
					 When visiting the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill in January, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the mill is mass-producing different bedclothes including quilts for winter, summer, spring and autumn and wedding and bedcover with silk fabrics and silk cotton produced by the Nyongbyon Silk Mill and other light industrial factories of the country.

articles.title: 38th Meeting of Union of Korean Students in Japan Held
articles.content:
38th Meeting of Union of Korean Students in Japan Held
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The 38th Meeting of the Union of Korean Students in Japan took place in Osaka of Japan on Feb. 28.
					 Present there were Han Tong Song, director of the Organizational Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and Kim Hyon Il, chairman of the Union Central Standing Committee, and other deputies to the union.
					
					 Kim Hyon Il in a report referred to the successes made in the social and practical activities during the 37th term of the union, including its expansion and strengthening, the movement for national reunification and the campaign to defend rights.
					
					 The reporter said that the "2018 plan for Union of Korean Students in Japan" would be set forth to usher in a new heyday of the union until 2018 which will greet the 24th Congress of Chongryon.
					
					 Kim Hyong Il was reelected as chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the union.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Koreans Killed during Horrible Air Raid on Tokyo Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Koreans Killed during Horrible Air Raid on Tokyo Held
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for the Korean victims was held in Tokyo on March 4 on the lapse of 72 years since the U.S. forces made an air raid on Tokyo, according to Choson Sinbo, mouthpiece of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there were Jin Kil Sang, director of the Rights and Welfare Department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, and other officials of Chongryon, and Koreans in Kanto and the representative of the Tokyo fact-finding group for probe into the truth about the forcible drafting of Koreans, Soji Yamada, honorary professor at Rikkyo University, and other Japanese citizens.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the victims.
					
					 Introduced there were a joint memorial address from the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims and the Association of Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting and Their Bereaved Families and a memorial address from the South Korean Council for Promoting Compensation for the Pacific War Victims.
					
					 Speakers at the service expressed the will to make sustained efforts to let the Japanese government recognize the entry of the Korean bereaved families and do their best to pray for the souls of those killed during the air raid on Tokyo and probe the losses suffered by Koreans.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Brands U.S. Representative at UN as Political Prostitute
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Brands U.S. Representative at UN as Political Prostitute
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. representative at the UN Haley known for her capricious political savvy has now gone helter-skelter.
					 At a press conference on March 8 that followed a session of the UN Security Council on discussing measures to counter the DPRK's ballistic rocket launch, she said they are not dealing with a man of reason, meant the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with such words as "blame" and "no negotiations".
					
					 Her wild words are just sophism of political and diplomatic half-wit devoid of the ability to analyze and judge things and express oneself.
					
					 She is no more than a crafty woman who rose to the post of representing the U.S. at the international body for her worldly wisdom and disguise. 
					
					 In the past she posed herself as a white for her political purpose and at the 2010 election of state governor she was fined for hiding the case of lobbying only to be branded as political swindler and criminal.
					
					 She is pointed as a political prostitute even from ordinary people for her chameleon-like nature.
					
					 At the presidential election last year she opposed the present owner of the White House, saying that certain is the point that no support will be given, and flattered Rubio, key election rival, saying only when he is elected, every day will be pleasant.
					
					 But no sooner had the present chief executive taken office than she twisted his arm to sending her to the UN to represent the U.S. She is, for sure, a matchless political prostitute.
					
					 She has only pursued successful career and financial benefits, with no heed given to conscience and morality. Now she has become an idiot unable to judge whether it is realistic and reasonable or not to trumpet about the "north Korea's denuclearization first".
					
					 We have no interest in dealing with such human rejects as Haley, wagging her tongue without elementary concept on the reason.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Reveals Crimes of Traitor Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Reveals Crimes of Traitor Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The evermore undisguised economic slump and the destitution of people's livelihood in south Korea are an inevitable result entailed by the treacherous policy of traitor Park Guen Hye, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 When she was elected as "president", the traitor committed herself to the "democratization of economy", "job creation" and "wellbeing".
					
					 The traitor who regards people as dogs and pigs scrapped half of more than 200 commitments related to economy and people's livelihood and cut down the scope of their implementation before six months since she took office. She was, therefore, stigmatized as "master of scrapping commitments".
					
					 She forcibly pushed ahead with nationalization of public fields including railways and medicine, though she promised she would not press for it without agreement of the people. She even defaulted on other promises under the pretext of "serious financial situation", thereby bringing about "serious chaos concerning rented houses and dwelling houses".
					
					 She raised the "bill on reorganizing income tax" in a bid to put under control the situation caused by cut-down of the taxes for rich men.
					
					 She reneged on her promise to raise wages for the people and suspended pensions for public employees and teachers.
					
					 As was clearly disclosed through the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal", the fraudulence and illicit fortune by Chongwadae witch far surpassed those by the successive puppet rulers.
					
					 Her submission to the U.S. and her acts of sycophancy and treachery made the south Korean economy further dependent on the U.S. and resulted in the worst destitution of people's livelihood.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Derides Park Geun Hye Forsaken by U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Derides Park Geun Hye Forsaken by U.S.
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of State in its recent "2016 report on human rights" detailed the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					 The report, specifying the scandal, dealt with the serious human rights situation in south Korea.
					
					 It means that Park's high-profile crimes are so obvious and undeniable that the U.S. could not but acknowledge them, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S., watching the public candlelight actions against Park that swept south Korea, drew a conclusion that there is no way to save Park whose doom had already been sealed and the U.S. would benefit nothing from her stay in power.
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that it is easy to say farewell to a two-bit prostitute and it is best to ditch in time such waste as Park.
					
					 So, it has gone so far as to unhesitatingly specify in its "human rights report" the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal", a disgrace to Park who is more dead than alive.
					
					 It is the plight of the puppets that they should always be scolded and hit by their master, whether they did good or bad. But the old witch of Chongwadae cursed and forsaken by the public for her unheard-of hideous scandal was thrown away by her master like trash.
					
					 The idiots taking their pride in sycophancy toward big powers and the parasites living on flattery for outsiders are bound to meet frosty reception from their master when they are no longer necessary.
					
					 Pitiful, indeed, is the plight of Park forsaken by the U.S. though she devotedly served it.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Blamed for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Blamed for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article accuses the hostile forces such as the U.S. imperialists of frantically staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the DPRK despite the latter's warning and strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad.
					 The article blames the U.S. for seeking to convince the public that the joint military exercises are ascribable to the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 It discloses that the above-said exercises are the racket for posing nuclear threat to the DPRK which have been persistently staged since long before the latter had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 It refers to the fact that the DPRK has made steady and dynamic efforts for defending peace against nuclear weapons and a war to remove the U.S. escalating nuclear threat and turn the Korean Peninsula into a nuclear free zone.
					
					 However, the U.S. has got more frantic in its nuclear war drills against the north such the Team Spirit while challenging the DPRK's sincere and positive efforts for denuclearization with sophism that the "Asia-Pacific region can not be nuclear free", it says, and goes on.
					
					 Tension on the Korean Peninsula is not ascribable to the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons meant for self-defence but the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' nuclear war drills against the former.
					
					 The U.S. extremely hostile policy toward the DPRK and joint military exercises are, indeed, the basic factor compelling the latter to have access to the nuclear strike capability for self-defence and intensify it.
					
					 It is the exercise of the DPRK's legitimate right to take powerful counter-measures against the war drills.

articles.title: S. Korea: Defense Minister and Officials Concerned Accused of Pressing forward THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korea: Defense Minister and Officials Concerned Accused of Pressing forward THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment, Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment, Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism and the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment in south Korea held a press conference on March 8 in Seoul to condemn the puppet minister of Defense and officials concerned for pressing forward the deployment of THAAD, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 At the press conference, they held that the THAAD deployment was a breach of the constitution from its very beginning as it infringed upon the sovereignty of the people without providing any information to them.
					
					 They denounced the minister and officials concerned for persistently pushing forward the THAAD deployment, though it is becoming clear that it infringes upon the legal rights of people such as their sovereignty, lives and security and property ownership.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Party Condemns Military Authorities
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Party Condemns Military Authorities
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The office of spokesman for the Minjung Yonhap Party of south Korea on Tuesday released a commentary to denounce the puppet military authorities for pursuing the U.S. policy of THAAD deployment.
					 The commentary noted that as soon as some THAAD launching pads and related equipment were brought to the Osan U.S. air-force base, the defence ministry announced they would be deployed in Songju, North Kyongsang Province.
					
					 A military officer concerned claimed that the early introduction of THAAD is to cope with "the north's nuclear and missile threat", but there is a suspicion that the deployment was made to meet a political purpose of sparking security crisis, in actuality, the commentary said.
					
					 All acts of inviting retaliatory measures from a neighboring state should be halted, the commentary said, adding that south Korea should not be reduced to a theater of confrontation among big powers.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Discloses Gender Discrimination in Society
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Discloses Gender Discrimination in Society
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on March 9 carried an editorial disclosing the gender discrimination in the south Korean society.
					 It noted that women workers of south Korea staged an action at the plaza of Kwanghwamun in Seoul on March 8 to urge proper distribution of wages for labor without gender discrimination.
					
					 South Korea has the worst gender discrimination in the world, it said, adding that it is the 116th in the world on gender discrimination index.

articles.title: S. Korean Women's Organizations Call for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Women's Organizations Call for Peace against War
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Women's organizations of south Korea, including the Women Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the Women's Solidarity, held a rally for the world women's peace action against THAAD and war in Seoul on Wednesday, according to the south Korean Internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 A declaration, read out at the rally, said that the women have struggled for a safe, democratic and equal society.
					
					 It recalled the military maneuvers that lasted for the past 64 years only stirred up resistance and conflict, far from promoting peaceful reunification.
					
					 The rally adopted an appeal for rejecting all war maneuvers, working for peace, reunification and national prosperity by concerted efforts of the nation and waging the sustainable women's movement for peace against war.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Demand Right Solution to Sexual Slavery Issue
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Demand Right Solution to Sexual Slavery Issue
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The foundation for preserving justice for right solution to the issue of sexual slavery for the Japanese army and the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1273rd Wednesday rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on March 8, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Recalling the victims to the sexual slavery courageously testified to prove the crime though it was hard for them to do so and talked the truth behind it in various parts of the world, the speakers said women and citizens called for restoration of justice and human rights together with the victims.
					
					 When all join their efforts, we can bring justice to south Korea, they said, calling for carrying on the struggle until Japan sincerely apologizes for the past crimes.

articles.title: Foreign Media Give Special Write-ups to Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Foreign Media Give Special Write-ups to Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and magazines of different countries gave wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 75th birth anniversary.
					 The Hungarian newspaper Szabadsag said in an article titled "The DPRK significantly celebrates the Day of the Shining Star", illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, that Kim Jong Il is the great revolutionary and peerless statesman as he led socialist Korea to victory in the unprecedentedly grim period.
					
					 Ethiopia's newspaper Reporter and Uganda's newspaper Sun Rise carried special write-ups titled "February in the DPRK and Kim Jong Il" and "Prominent Leader Kim Jong Il" with his smiling portraits.
					
					 The papers introduced the undying ideo-theoretical and leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il on behalf of the times and humanity.
					
					 A Nepalese magazine said in an article that the Korean people are significantly celebrating the Day of the Shining Star as the greatest auspicious holiday because the victory and prosperity of socialist Korea are unthinkable without HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Bangladesh newspaper Daily Industry and the Nigerian newspaper Statesman in their articles said that Kim Jong Il's birth was an event of great significance in the destiny and development of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Protested in Britain
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Protested in Britain
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A demonstration was staged outside the U.S. embassy in London on Mar. 4 to protest the provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces against the DPRK.
					 Taking part in it were personages of the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK and citizens.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said that the military drills being staged by the U.S. are for aggression as it removed the camouflage of "annual" and "defensive".
					
					 He demanded the U.S. stop the war games aimed at mounting a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK at once and withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea without delay.
					
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army was read out at the demonstration.
					
					 The protesters chanted such slogans as "The U.S. should get out of south Korea!", "Yankees, go back home!" "We oppose sanctions and war!" and "People's Korea will emerge victorious!", waving flags of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo el Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre terreno el Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan, convertido como unidad prototipica de la rama de diseno del pais. 
					Durante su visita realizada en julio del ano pasado, el Maximo Dirigente instruyo convertir el instituto como unidad ejemplar del sector de diseno, examino varias veces el proyecto de remodelacion interna y soluciono todos los problemas que se presentan en la obra de modernizacion. 
					
					Tras recibir el parte de culminacion de la obra, el Maximo Dirigente envio hace poco los medios modernos de diseno. 
					
					Ante todo, el Maximo Dirigente estuvo en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Viendo los datos y los objetos historicos que hacen conocer la historia de orientacion del Dirigente quien se esforzo por el desarrollo de arquitectura autoctona, recordo con gran emocion la trayectoria enorgullecedora del instituto. 
					
					Recorriendo el lugar de exhibicion de los exitos de la ciencia y tecnica arquitectonicas, la sala de estudio de diseno arquitectonico, la de documentos de diseno, la de estudio de datos informaticos y otros puntos del instituto, el Maximo Dirigente hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de modernizacion y los trabajos vigentes. 
					
					Cada vez que se presentaba en el pasado la construccion de objetos importantes, los disenadores, arquitectonicos e investigadores cumplieron satisfactoriamente las tareas dadas por el partido y crearon muchas excelentes obras arquitectonicas de valor de importancia nacional, recalco y agrego que el instituto es un versado y fidedigno colectivo de disenadores y un ejemplar de las unidades de diseno arquitectonico del pais. 
					
					Cerciorandose minuciosamente las caracteristicas tecnicas y la funcion de nuevos equipos, destaco que es posible adelantarse a los demas del mundo tambien en la creacion de arquitectura contemporanea cuando se apliquen las ciencias y las tecnologias desarrolladas en la rama.
					
					Es muy importante el deber del instituto, asevero y presento las tareas que sirven de guia en su administracion. 
					
					El partido deposita una gran confianza en el Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan, destaco y expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, los funcionarios, disenadores, arquitectonicos e investigadores seguiran cumpliendo con su mision y deber importantes y honrosos.
					
					Acto seguido se retrato junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompano Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del Comite de Estado de la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del Presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del Presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de respuesta que le remitiera el dia 9 Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria. 
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Extiendo agradecimiento a Vd., y al gobierno y pueblo amistosos de vuestro pais por haber enviado una cordial felicitacion en ocasion del 54o aniversario de la gloriosa Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					
					Apreciamos la posicion de principios de Vd., y la Direccion de la RPDC que se solidarizan con nuestro empeno para rechazar el terrorismo y defender la soberania, la seguridad y la estabilidad del pais.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las gestiones del Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung.
					Recorriendo varios procesos de produccion, estimulo a los obreros que aceleran la produccion de abono.
					
					En la reunion de consulta sesionada en el terreno, se impartieron las tareas para suministrar mayor cantidad de abono a las granjas cooperativas socialistas y para exigir a las unidades relacionadas el abastecimiento suficiente de materias primas.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier estuvo en el Complejo de Acero Chollima donde instruyo al sector de industria metalurgica aumentar la produccion de materiales de hierro y acero al aplicar tecnologias avanzadas que permitan rebajar el costo de produccion y normalizar la operacion de los procesos de produccion del tipo Juche.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN publica nota sobre la sentencia final a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN publica nota sobre la sentencia final a Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se dio ayer la sentencia final a la 18a "presidenta" surcoreana Park Geun-hye, el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional publico el dia 11 una declaracion. 
					Al cabo de las disputas renidas y contratiempos de mas de 90 dias del juicio sobre la mocion de dimision de Park Geun-hye, la "Corte Constitucional" dicto la decision final de destituirla de la "presidencia", comienza la nota.
					
					Esta advertencia severa de la historia comprueba que los vendepatrias de peor calana como Park no tienen otro remedio que sufrir el arruinamiento y la muerte, destaca y aclara la siguiente posicion sobre la actual situacion del Sur de Corea:
					
					1. El fin tragico de Park Geun-hye es la victoria historica de la justicia que trajo la inagotable fuerza del pueblo. Esto es la evaluacion unanime de la nacion. 
					
					Park Geun-hye fue enjuiciada y sentenciada no por algunas fuerzas especificas o la fraccion de oposicion politica, sino por el pueblo.
					
					En la historia de politica surcoreana estan registradas no pocas resistencias populares de dimensiones pequenas y grandes, pero es la primera vez que se logra la victoria mas popular en la lucha justa con velas que mediante las fuerzas unidas de las masas populares, trajo la victoria sobre la injusticia y derrumbo el "poder" conservador y proyanqui que se jactaba de su omnipotencia. 
					
					2. Los que traicionan a la nacion y recurren al servilismo a las fuerzas extranjeras y al enfrentamiento fratricida no pueden eludir el destino tragico como Park Geun-hye. He aqui nuestra posicion invariable. 
					
					Para la nacion dividida en dos partes, la mayor justicia esta en la reunificacion y la verdad absoluta reside en la independencia, la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales. 
					
					La sangre dedicada por la patria y la nacion, aunque sea una gota, sera apreciada siempre, pero las huellas de traicion al pais y la nacion seran repudiadas por toda la nacion generacion tras generacion. 
					
					3. Los fulanos y menganos como EE.UU. que vinieron amparando a la deformada escoria humana Park Geun-hye, abandonada por la nacion, tambien sufriran tarde o temprano el mismo destino de ella. Esto es la severa advertencia de la nacion coreana. 
					
					 ?Como podran ellos corregir su atributo abominable y pagar sus errores aunque se sientan avergonzados y arrepentidos de la caotica situacion del Sur de Corea?
					
					Se quedaron con brazos cruzados hasta los paises que decian palabras edulcorantes como "colaboracion" y "acompanante". 
					
					Esto es el valor de lacaya y su fin tragico.
					
					Ahora, la sociedad surcoreana se encuentra en el punto muy importante de cambio. 
					
					Triunfo la resistencia anti-Park Geun-hye de la poblacion surcoreana, pero esta victoria no es mas que el comienzo de la lucha por la genuina justicia y el progreso social. 
					
					La dimision de la traidora titere Park Geun-hye no trajo el cambio radical. Y no se lograra por casualidad la nueva politica independiente, la nueva sociedad democratica y la nueva vida digna, deseadas tanto por los habitantes surcoreanos. 
					
					Redoblando el coraje con que destruyeron el bastion de fuerzas conservadoras proyanquis y projaponesas, ellos deben luchar con dinamismo por sepultar a todos los reaccionarios de la historia y construir un nuevo mundo, donde se realicen sus suenos e ideales, y por forjar el futuro de reunificacion y prosperidad. 
					
					El fin de los traidores a la nacion es la muerte mas vergonzosa y la victoria final esta siempre al lado del pueblo justo y valiente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun reitera rechazo a los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun reitera rechazo a los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- A pesar de la advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la fuerte protesta de los nacionales y extranjeros, los imperialistas yanquis y las fuerzas hostiles desarrollan demencialmente los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle de caracter agresivo contra la RPDC.
					EE.UU. engana a la opinion publica hablando como si el inicio de esa maniobra de caracter criminal se debiera a la posesion de armas nucleares por parte de la RPDC.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este sabado un articulo individual que sigue:
					
					Tales ejercicios militares conjuntos, que significan la campana de amenaza nuclear anti-RPDC, tuvieron lugar repetidamente desde mucho antes de que esta poseyera el artefacto nuclear.
					
					Partiendo del objetivo de eliminar la creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y convertir la Peninsula Coreana en la zona desnuclearizada, nuestro pais se ha esforzado constantemente por defender la paz y rechazar el arma nuclear y la guerra.
					
					Desafiando a tales esfuerzos sinceros y activos con la sofisteria de que "es ilogica la palabra ´desnuclearizacion de la region de Asia-Pacifico´", EE.UU. intensifico Team Spirit y otros entrenamientos belicos anti-Norte de Corea.
					
					La causa de agravacion de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana no reside en la posesion de armas nucleares autodefensivas por parte de la RPDC sino en los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					La extremada politica hostil y los ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC son el factor principal que obligo a ella a preparar la capacidad de ataque nuclear de autodefensa y centuplicarla.
					
					Responder a los entrenamientos agresivos con intransigentes medidas de autodefensa constituye el ejercicio legitimo de nuestro derecho soberano.
